textAfterTable: What is unique about this Sri Lanka News site? LankaNewspapers.com's simple, clutter free design and news discussions makes it stand out from rest of the Sri Lanka News sites. It's discussion database and interface was built from ground up without the use of any 3rd party discussion / forum tools. How often does the Sri Lanka News RSS feed gets updated? The RSS feed is updated every 5 minutes. Is there an easy way to show this Sri Lanka News source my website? Yes. There is a simple JavaScript function that you could use in your website to display real-time news from Lanka News Papers. What are the Sri Lanka News sources that LankaNewspapers use? We receive news from over 50 different affiliated news networks. In addition to those administrating members has the ability to post their own new articles.
